## SolidLineTechniqueParams.secondaryCaps property

Describes secondary line caps type (`"None"`<!-- -->, `"Round"`<!-- -->, `"Square"`<!-- -->, `"TriangleOut"`<!-- -->, `"TriangleIn"`<!-- -->). Default is `"Round"`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
secondaryCaps?: DynamicProperty<LineCaps>;
```
